title: Badge Pick-Up Opens

title: Intro into Sexual Health
description: Sexual health is a far more expansive topic than the US education system prefers to present. The World Health Organization has identified 19 different aspects of sexual health, and we only typically scratch the surface of it, mostly because we tend to focus on risk management and pleasure, physical and/or psychological. Come sit in with me and broaden your perspectives on you and your partners' sexual health. Presented by Alex Fort.

title: Real-Life Expansion
description: Expansion fans rejoice! Whether its a padded muscle suit or a specially designed Breast Expansion rig, join in as several prop creators put their heads together and discuss different ways to approach creating costuming solutions towards all sorts of fantasies. We just may have a few supplies to share, for those interested in learning a bit about constructing new props themselves. Get ready for some BIG surprises including a live saline infusion!

title: Casting Demonstration
description: Body casting is a technique used to replicate the human form for either artistic, medical, or special effects purposes. For this demonstration Clark Nova will cast Demora's torso using professional casting materials and then, through the con, cast it in specialized resin. You will learn about the materials, techniques, and their benefits/ limitations so you too may try casting your own body forms.

title: Virtual Hybrid Social
description: We have had a blast putting together online events over the past years since our last in person SizeCon, and we have had such a wonderful time meeting new folks. title: Diversity in the Size Community
description: As our community grows (and shrinks‚Ä¶ and expands‚Ä¶) more and more people are getting exposed to different forms of Size-based erotica. What does this mean for the future of the Size community? What is the role of the LGBTQ community within the things we love and what unique perspectives can we bring to the table? What can be done to reduce bullying in the community and to encourage women and minorities as creators? What stories would you like to share? Join us for a discussion that aims to give a spotlight to often overlooked folks in our community.

description: We take it for granted, but the infrastructure that we use to navigate our favorite online size spaces were built by passionate size fans just like you. title: Closing Ceremony

title: SizeCon City Destruction Raffle
description: Marvel at the model city destined for destruction! Attendees are encouraged to buy tickets for the chance to win entire city blocks. The lucky winners will get to destroy their winnings with their bare hands and feet in an orgy of destruction. Attendees are encouraged to take photos with the city before final destruction.

title: SizeCon Feedback Social
description: We rely on YOUR feedback every year to make SizeCon the best event it can be. This is actually NOT a social but a chance to share directly with SizeCon staff your ideas about what could be better, what was INCREDIBLE, and what you want to see for next time! We can't do this without you, so thank you!

title: Silent Auction Charity Event
description: Want to support a noble cause? Want to get some really awesome swag from some of your favorite artists and writers? Come fill out our silent charity auction form and do both at the same time! 100% of the proceeds from this event will be donated to the Human Rights Campaign. More information available at https://www.hrc.org/.

title: SizeCon Floor Closes
description: Thanks for another unforgettable year at SizeCon!
